title: Peach Caipirinha Recipe
full_text:
Peach Caipirinha Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
half very ripe
peach
3/4
ounce
freshly squeezed juice
from
1 to 2
whole
limes
1
teaspoon
sugar
2 1/4
ounces
cachaca
1/2
lime
, cut in
4
wedges
Directions
Slice peach in quarters and place in cocktail shaker. Add lime juice and sugar, muddle well. Add cachaça and lime wedges, fill shaker with ice and shake until very cold, about 15 seconds. Pour unstrained into a rocks glass.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
